languages.text: Рабочего избивали с умом, следя, чтобы не повредились суставы. Он страдает, но все еще может трудиться на благо династии.
The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.
languages.original_text: Рабочего избивали с умом, следя, чтобы не повредились суставы. Он страдает, но все еще может трудиться на благо династии.

traits.locale_text: The worker was beaten with skill, taking care not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

languages.text: Der Arbeiter wurde gezielt geschlagen, um seinen Gelenken keinen Schaden zuzufügen. Er hat Schmerzen, kann aber weiter für die Dynastie arbeiten.
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Der Arbeiter wurde gezielt geschlagen, um seinen Gelenken keinen Schaden zuzufügen. Er hat Schmerzen, kann aber weiter für die Dynastie arbeiten.

languages.text: L'ouvrier a été battu d'une main de maître, qui a visiblement pris soin d'éviter d'esquinter ses articulations. Ainsi, bien que le pauvre homme souffre, il peut toujours travailler pour la dynastie.
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: L'ouvrier a été battu d'une main de maître, qui a visiblement pris soin d'éviter d'esquinter ses articulations. Ainsi, bien que le pauvre homme souffre, il peut toujours travailler pour la dynastie.

languages.text: Este trabajador ha recibido una paliza experta, evitando dañar sus articulaciones. Aunque sufre, sigue pudiendo trabajar para la dinastía.
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Este trabajador ha recibido una paliza experta, evitando dañar sus articulaciones. Aunque sufre, sigue pudiendo trabajar para la dinastía.

languages.text: 労働者は関節を傷つけないように気をつけて、巧みに殴られていた。彼は苦しんでいるが、それでも王朝のために働くことはできる。
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 労働者は関節を傷つけないように気をつけて、巧みに殴られていた。彼は苦しんでいるが、それでも王朝のために働くことはできる。

languages.text: 这个工人遭到了殴打，但殴打他的人技术很精湛，没有伤到他的关节。虽然他浑身疼痛，但依然可以为王朝工作。
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 这个工人遭到了殴打，但殴打他的人技术很精湛，没有伤到他的关节。虽然他浑身疼痛，但依然可以为王朝工作。

languages.text: İşçiyi işini bilen birisi, eklemlerine hasar vermemeye dikkat ederek dövmüş. Acı çekse de hanedanlık için çalışmaya devam edebilir.
languages.original_text: The worker was beaten with skill, and care was taken not to damage his joints. He is suffering, but he can still work for the dynasty.
